episodes.title: KANUNGU MASSACRE - A UGANDAN CULT THAT KILLED THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE
episodes.description: In the year 2000, around 1000 people were killed in a church fire planned and organized by what was believed to be an apocalyptic cult. The movement for restoration and  of the ten commandments of God led by Joseph Kibwetere and Credonia Mwerinde, headquartered in Kanungu district, South Western Uganda. Their teachings and actions however, are reported to have caused untold suffering and torture on the flock and their families. It was reported that over 3,000 people lost their lives throughout the cult tenure.
subjects: Movement for the Restoration of the Ten Commandments of God

episodes.title: MURDER IN CHURCH I A CULT THAT KILLED 3,000 PEOPLE
episodes.description: A tragic story of faith and death. How a prostitute connived with highly respected public figures to recruit masses in a killed and carryout cold murders for over a decade. On march 17, 2000, a cult led by Credonia Mwerinde, Joseph Kibwetere and others killed hundreds of believers in an inferno when set alight a church in Kanungu district, Western Uganda.
subjects: Movement for the Restoration of the Ten Commandments of God
